title: [ Crash ] Playing Yasuo crashes my game
body: Whenever I play yasuo the game instantly crashes and I need to shut down and then re power my computer. Please fix riot. Comment if you have same problem or if you know a fix please.{{champion:157}}

replies.body: I have the same problem, but I don't have to shutdown my computer. What I do, is randomly click all over the screen and eventually the windows pop-up comes up saying "This program has crashed lel". I close the program, and reconnect to the game. Works perfectly fine afterward.
